DataElement.preferredName: Patient Travel Memory Dysfunction Assessment Medication Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether a patient sometimes forgets to bring cancer medication with them when they travel or leave home.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Travel Memory Dysfunction Assessment Medication
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a patient forgetting to bring medication when traveling.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The act of going from one place to another.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The act of going from one place to another.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.

Property.preferredDefinition: Interference or disruption of memory processes. Memory dysfunction refers to the inability to store  and retrieve information. This term encompasses a large number of problems and issues associated with intellectual functioning. 2005:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Interference or disruption of memory processes. Memory dysfunction refers to the inability to store and retrieve information. This term encompasses a large number of problems and issues associated with intellectual functioning. 2005
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
